channel.title: How to edit lunar magic spells to teleport to certain things?(pi)
channel.description:
My source has teles for normal magic and ancients but not lunars, how can i make it so certain lunar spells teleport you to certain areas (using tele emote not just instantly)
and also how can i prevent my home tele from immediately making someone appear at home (as opposed to the 2 second delay and tele emote)
thanks in advance

item.title: How to edit lunar magic spells to teleport to certain things?(pi)
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

clickingmost.java find your ancient and normal magic there should be a case with the lunar magic ID (Dont ask me I dont remember it) just create your teleports in that case and poof lunar spell teleports

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit lunar magic spells to teleport to certain things?(pi)
